title: Link
description: A link to a related operation or resource.

method.description: The HTTP method for the link.

rel.description: The relationship of the link to the resource.

uri.description: The relative URI for the link.

type.description: The media type or link type for the link.

itemType.description: If this is a link to a container, `itemType` is the media type or link type for the items in the container.

responseType.description: The media type or link type of the response body for a `PUT`, `POST`, or `PATCH` operation.

responseItemType.description: The media type or link type of the items in the response body for a `PUT`, `POST`, or `PATCH` operation.
